titles.title: Congratulating the Downers Grove North High School Trojan football team and the students and fans of Downers Grove North High School on their outstanding sportsmanship and on winning the 2004 Illinois Class 8A Football State Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Congratulates the Downers Grove North Trojan football team, students, and fans on their outstanding sportsmanship and on winning the 2004 Illinois Class 8A Football State Championship.
